channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: Portland Cycling Club Custom Cap
item.description:
The Seight Cap is designed from a soft, lightweight, waterproof, wind repelling, and extremely breathable poly fabric. It has an exceptional ability to soak up sweat and prevent it from running into your eyes. It also dries quickly and its machine wa..

Price: $21.82

item.title: Portland Cycling Club Custom Short Sleeve Jersey (Blue)
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Portland Cycling Club Custom Bib Shorts (Blue)
item.description:
If you are looking for a great entry-level bib shorts, the Seight Bib Shorts are exactly what you need. They are a modern and comfy cycling apparel that gives you great value for your money, and are well designed to fit both men and women riders.

..

item.title: Portland Cycling Club Custom Elite Pro Bib Shorts (Blue)
item.description:
Perfect, immaculate, and incredible - is what best describes the Seight Elite Bib Shorts. It is indeed the top pro bib shorts ever made, bar none! The sublimated panel is made with 240gsm Lycra from Italy, while the unsublimated panel is 225gsm, whic..

item.title: Portland Cycling Club Custom Winter Elite Pro Bib Shorts (Blue)
item.description:
